title: Polaroid Moment
description: A candid Polaroid-style shot of two people with slight motion blur and camera flash.
promptText: Make this image of two people look like it was taken with a Polaroid camera. There should be no obvious subjects or props. It should look like a random shot captured by chance. The image should appear like a snapshot without any special attention. Include a slight motion blur and light from the camera flash in a dark area that spreads evenly throughout the photo. Dont distort the face. Change the background behind the two people to a white curtain. The guy should be touching my face.

title: Elegant Brown Attire
description: An ultra-realistic 8K portrait of a couple in a brown suit and silky brown gown with a 90s retro aesthetic.
promptText: An ultra-realistic 8K portrait of a young couple seated closely together, both gazing directly at the camera with confident expressions. The man is dressed in a tailored brown suit with a crisp white shirt and a classic black bow tie, exuding timeless sophistication. The woman wears a silky brown gown with a deep neckline, draped fabric, and pearl-beaded straps running down the side slit, paired with delicate lace-up brown high heels. Her long hair flows in soft waves, styled in a natural, glamorous retro look, while her earrings add a subtle sparkle. The man sits upright in a wooden chair, one hand resting naturally while the other gently supports the woman, ensuring realistic human hands without distortion. The woman sits elegantly on his lap, one leg crossed forward, her posture confident yet graceful. Their skin tones and textures appear natural, detailed, and lifelike with subtle highlights. No extra heads, elements, or third persons are visible in the frame. The background evokes a 90s retro aesthetic with warm golden sunlight casting soft shadows, creating a cinematic glow. The overall composition radiates intimacy, charm, and vintage elegance, perfectly blending modern realism with retro style.

title: Snowy Forest Romance
description: A romantic winter scene of a couple sitting on a snow-covered log in a snowy forest.
promptText: A romantic winter scene featuring a young couple sitting on a snow-covered log in a serene snowy forest. The man, dressed in a black sleeveless shirt and black pants, lovingly holds the woman, who is wearing a gray sleeveless top, blue jeans, and white sneakers. Snowflakes gently fall around them, while glowing blue flowers adorn the surrounding trees, adding a magical touch. The frozen lake and snow-covered landscape in the background enhance the dreamy, cozy, and intimate atmosphere.

title: 70s Bollywood Glamour
description: A vintage Indian woman portrait from the 1970s, styled in traditional Bollywood fashion.
promptText: Take the face from the attached reference photo exactly 100% the same (do not alter her facial features, keep her identity intact). A vintage Indian woman portrait from the 1970s, styled in traditional Bollywood fashion. She has long, voluminous black hair adorned with two red roses tucked behind her ear. A bold black bindi sits on her forehead, and her large expressive eyes are highlighted with dramatic winged eyeliner. She wears heavy golden jhumka earrings and a delicate gold necklace. Her outfit is a saree in shades of black and purple with floral designs, paired with multiple bangles in gold, black, and purple. The woman’s pose is graceful, with her chin resting gently on her clasped hands, exuding elegance and charm. The background is soft and neutral, enhancing the retro aesthetic and focusing attention on her face and attire. The overall mood is glamorous, classic, and reminiscent of old Bollywood cinema posters.

title: Field of Sound
description: A cinematic photograph of a young man with headphones in a lush green field.
promptText: Take the face from the attached reference photo exactly 100% the same (do not alter his facial features, keep his identity intact). A cinematic, moody photograph of a young man standing in a lush green field of tall grass under a cloudy, overcast sky. He is wearing a loose, dark button-up shirt and dark trousers. His posture is expressive and dramatic, leaning slightly backward with one arm outstretched and palm open, as if embracing the wind or the moment. His head is tilted back, eyes closed, and he is wearing large, over-ear silver headphones, giving a sense of calm and emotional release. The perspective is slightly low-angle, enhancing the dramatic, immersive atmosphere.

title: Modern Café Elegance
description: A high-fashion lifestyle editorial portrait of an elegant Indian man in a modern cafe.
promptText: Use the attached image of the person as the sole facial and hairstyle reference, keeping the exact same face, hairstyle, and overall appearance as in the reference image with a realistic and natural look. Create a high-fashion lifestyle editorial portrait of a 20-year-old Indian man, elegant and sophisticated, sitting on a wooden chair in a modern cafe. He holds a white coffee cup in both hands in a refined gesture, exuding confidence and charm. He is wearing a structured white shirt with a white blazer casually draped over the shoulders, paired with wide-cut jeans. Accessories include rectangular sunglasses with gold details, a luxury gold watch, and a bold statement ring. His skin should appear natural, youthful, and glowing with soft highlights. The background is an elegant cafe environment, softly blurred to emphasize the subject. The lighting is soft, warm, and natural, illuminating the face and reflecting off the gold accessories to create a luxurious glow. His body posture is slightly leaning forward, evoking sophistication, elegance, and presence.

title: Fisheye City Night
description: A vintage-style flash photograph of a stylish man on a city street with a fisheye lens effect.
promptText: Generate a vertical 9:16 high-resolution 8K vintage-style flash photograph entirely based on the uploaded reference photo, keeping the exact same face, hairstyle, and overall appearance of the subject with no changes. The image should depict a stylish white man standing confidently on a nighttime city street, captured with dramatic fisheye lens distortion. Apply subtle grain, light film scratches, and analog texture effects to achieve a nostalgic yet editorial feel. He is wearing an abstract red shirt with bold, expressive artistic patterns, partially unbuttoned to reveal a confident, edgy demeanor. Chunky metallic jewelry and fashionable sunglasses enhance his striking streetwear aesthetic. The city backdrop should be softened and transformed with cozy home party vibes—glowing red ambient lighting, delicate string lights hanging above, and a warm, intimate atmosphere that blends festivity with the urban night scene. Skin texture must look flawless and realistic, with dramatic lighting, soft shadows, and lens flash reflections for depth. Ensure no distortions, no anatomical flaws. Maintain all the characteristics of the main character from the uploaded photo while elevating the image into a cinematic, editorial-quality portrait.

title: Wicker Chair Lounge
description: A hyper-realistic cinematic lifestyle portrait of a stylish Indian man lounging on a modern hanging wicker chair.
promptText: Create a hyper-realistic cinematic lifestyle portrait entirely based on the uploaded reference photo, keeping the exact same face, hairstyle, and overall appearance with no alterations. A stylish young Indian man lounges confidently on a modern hanging wicker chair, dressed in a trendy all-white coord set with a casual T-shirt and open shirt, paired with colorful designer sneakers and a luxury wristwatch. His expression is cool and composed as he slightly leans back with a relaxed posture, wearing dark sunglasses that add charisma to his look. The setting is a minimal outdoor terrace with subtle decor, soft natural daylight, and a clean modern vibe. Captured in ultra-detailed 8K resolution with sharp textures, natural skin tones, realistic shadows, and a premium fashion editorial aesthetic.
